item.description: Firefighters extinguish fires in the home area. Firefighters can't extinguish fires outside the home area.

Patients go to a medical bed to receive treatment for life-threatening health conditions (e.g. a treatable illness). It is not advisable to ever disable this or severely lower the priority. See the 'bed rest' task to set the priority for non-disease injuries.

Doctors bandage wounds, treat the sick, and perform operations. Doctors also automatically rescue downed colonists. Doctors tend to colonists, rescued allies, prisoners and colony animals, but they must be resting in a bed or sleeping spot. Tend to patients with urgent needs. Tend to patients. Tend to self (emergency). Tend to entities.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Tend to self. Feed patients. Operate on humanlikes. Administer hemogen.Content added by the Biotech DLC Rescue downed allies to bed. Tend to animals. Feed animals (patient animals only). Operate on animals. Take patients to bed for operations. Visit sick people . Extract bioferrite from entities.Content added by the Anomaly DLC
Colonists assigned to bed rest will rest in a bed to heal injuries. This is separate from a colonist's need to sleep to replenish rest.
Care for a baby or child of the colony. Teach child. Bring babies to safe temperature. Breastfeed babies. Play with babies. Feed babies. Carry to mother.

Colonists will complete tasks that are unskilled and easy to complete. Flick switches - toggle power on appliances and switches, or open/close vents. Release prisoners. Open containers marked to open: graves, cryptosleep caskets, sarcophagi, and loot containers. Change dryad types.Content added by the Ideology DLC Extract skull.Content added by the Ideology DLC * Note: Even when not assigned to Basic work, colonists can still be directed with right-click to open a container not marked to open.

Wardens feed prisoners, chat with them, and try to recruit them, as chosen by the player. Wardens also carry out prisoner releases and executions. Interrogate identityContent added by the Anomaly DLC Execute entities.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Execute prisoners. Execute guilty colonists.Content added by the Ideology DLC Execute prisoners. Emancipate slaves.Content added by the Ideology DLC Release prisoners. Enslave prisoners.Content added by the Ideology DLC Suppress entity activity.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Take prisoners to bed. Feed prisoners. Imprison slaves.Content added by the Ideology DLC Convert prisoners.Content added by the Ideology DLC Deliver hemogen to prisoners.Content added by the Biotech DLC Deliver food to prisoners. Suppress slaves.Content added by the Ideology DLC Release entities.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Chat with prisoners.

Handlers tame, train, feed, milk, shear and slaughter tamed animals. Handlers also rescue wounded animals.
Note: Slaughtering animals is a violent act and will not be carried out by pawns incapable of violence. Take roaming animals to pen. Feed sick animals.(animal patients - sick or injured animals resting in an animal bed or sleeping spot designated as medical) Take to pen. (presumably this one is for moving animals from a hitching spot to a pen) Slaughter animals. Release to wild. Milk animals. Shear animals. Tame animals. Train animals. Rebalance animals in pens.
Cooks butcher animals, prepare meals, and brew beer. Cook meals at stove. Cook meals at campfire. Butcher creatures. Brew liquors.
Hunters hunt animals marked for hunting, but will require a ranged weapon to do so (you will be notified via message of colonists with the Hunting job without one).

Constructors build things, smooth floors, repair damaged buildings and structures, and fix broken-down equipment with components. Fix broken-down buildings. Uninstall structures. Build roofs. Remove roofs. Construct placed frames. Deliver resources to frames. Deliver resources to blueprints. Fill in.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Deconstruct structures. Repair damaged things. Remove floors. Smooth floors. Smooth walls.
Growers plant and harvest domestic crops. Harvest crops. Plant seeds. Replant trees. Sow crops.
Miners dig out marked sections of stone or minerals, as well as operating deep drills. Mine. Drill at deep drill.
Plant cutters harvest food from wild plant and cut down marked plants. Extract trees. Prune Gauranlen trees.Content added by the Ideology DLC Cut plants.

Create weapons and tools from raw materials, either as a blacksmith or by machining. Also repair mechanoids, if the colonist is a mechanitor.Content added by the Biotech DLC Make things at subcore encoder.Content added by the Biotech DLC Make things at mech gestator.Content added by the Biotech DLC Repair mech.Content added by the Biotech DLC Make weapons (at smithy). Make things at machining table. Make things at bioferrite shaper.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Fabricate things.
Tailors craft clothing at a tailor bench (electric / hand tailor bench).
Artists make sculptures at the art bench. Remove paint. Remove floor paint. Paint buildings Paint floor Make things at art bench

Craftsman do general low-skilled labor at work like stonecutting and smelting. Make things at crafting spot. Work at refinery. Synthesize drugs. Make stone blocks. Smelt items. Make things at serum lab.Content added by the Anomaly DLC
item.relevantSkill: Crafting Cooking (Drug Cooking only) Intellectual (Drug Synthesis only) None (Stone Cutting and Smelting only)
item.category:
Skilled labor
Intellectual (Drug Synthesis and Serums only)

item.description:
Haulers do a number of things, including:
Capture entity.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Rearm turrets. Refuel fuelable buildings (Torch lamps, generators, Fueled stoves etc.). Unload carriers. Load caravan. Bank genepack.Content added by the Biotech DLC Load transporters. Empty waste container.Content added by the Biotech DLC Carry to biosculpter pod.Content added by the Ideology DLC Carry to growth vat.Content added by the Biotech DLC Haul to map. Strip corpses. Haul corpses. Carry to gene extractor.Content added by the Biotech DLC Carry to growth vat.Content added by the Biotech DLC Haul mechs to charger.Content added by the Biotech DLC Carry to subcore scanner.Content added by the Biotech DLC Haul resources to carriers. Haul resources to subcore scanner.Content added by the Biotech DLC Haul resources to wastepack atomizer.Content added by the Biotech DLC Transfer entities.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Fill food hoppers. Do cremation bills. Do bills at campfire (such as burning drugs). Take beer out of fermenting barrels. Empty egg boxes. Take bioferrite out of bioferrite harvester.Content added by the Anomaly DLC Fill fermenting barrels. Haul general things. Deliver resources to frames. Deliver resources to blueprints. Merge things.
Cleaners remove filth such as dirt, blood, and vomit, which would otherwise negatively affect the beauty of a room. Clear snow. Clean filth. Clean pollution.
Interact with anomalous entities.

Create xenogerm.Content added by the Biotech DLC Study archotech structures. Research work at a simple research bench or hi-tech research bench to unlock new items and building options. Scanning at the Long-range mineral scanner. Scanning at the Ground-penetrating scanner.
没事干就睡觉
